LABEL: 0x31F
STRING: The door opened.

LABEL: 0x337
STRING: The atmosphere inside the room changed.

LABEL: 0x353
STRING: A dry draft blew through the closed room.

LABEL: 0x383
STRING: A visitor.

LABEL: 0x399
STRING: ――But who?

LABEL: 0x3B1
STRING: I stared at the door with suspicion and caution in my eyes.

LABEL: 0x3DD
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x4C2
STRING: 「Oh, Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4E2
STRING: 「You're awake.」

LABEL: 0x576
STRING: 「Akari-chan...」

LABEL: 0x5D5
STRING: Yukari strode in through the open door.

LABEL: 0x5FD
STRING: Accompanied by Tokiwa, who was walking slowly behind her, they entered the room and closed the door.

LABEL: 0x651
STRING: Tokiwa seemed to still be somewhat listless like before.

LABEL: 0x683
STRING: Touri looked like she wanted to say something, but in the end, she closed her mouth.

LABEL: 0x735
STRING: 「Momoi, so...」

LABEL: 0x7C3
STRING: 「――Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x84D
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x868
STRING: Yukari walked straight over to Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x898
STRING: He was surprised by her unexpected behavior.

LABEL: 0x92C
STRING: 「W-What is it, Momoi...?」

LABEL: 0x9BE
STRING: 「Um... Well...」

LABEL: 0xA1F
STRING: She looked like she had a hard time saying it. After a moment, she bowed her head to Hiragino, folding from the waist up.

LABEL: 0xAED
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0xB73
STRING: 「I apologize for my rudeness earlier.」

LABEL: 0xBBD
STRING: 「It was so sudden, and I lost my head a bit.」

LABEL: 0xC01
STRING: 「Even though I'm the chief attendant, I ended up causing you trouble...」

LABEL: 0xC4F
STRING: 「I'm embarrassed to admit it.」

LABEL: 0xC7A
STRING: The unusually meek Yukari bowed her head without any hidden meaning.

LABEL: 0xD17
STRING: Taken aback, Hiragino eventually realized what's going on and scratched his head.

LABEL: 0xDCB
STRING: 「Well... I apologize as well.」

LABEL: 0xDF9
STRING: 「I know what you said was right, but... my emotions got the better of me.」

LABEL: 0xE49
STRING: 「I'm not going to blame it on my current health.」

LABEL: 0xE98
STRING: 「Not at all...」

LABEL: 0xFCD
STRING: 「...Well, I'll be counting on you from now on too.」

LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: I wanted to make fun of them, but them making up was a great thing.

LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: If the two adults remained hostile to each other, the atmosphere would get worse.

LABEL: 0x10D6
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x10EC
STRING: For the sake of saving everyone, there was no time for arguing.

LABEL: 0x112A
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: 「So, how did it go in the wheelhouse...?」

LABEL: 0x11D4
STRING: 「Well...

LABEL: 0x1241
STRING: About that.」

LABEL: 0x1262
STRING: Her face immediately clouded over as I mentioned the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x128C
STRING: I had a bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0x12AA
STRING: Beside her, Tokiwa didn't seem to be in a joking mood either. She just stood there with a serious expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x1362
STRING: 「I'm sorry...」

LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: 「We gave up. We couldn't restore the lights.」

LABEL: 0x1417
STRING: 「No, to be precise...」

LABEL: 0x143B
STRING: 「We couldn't repair the other systems either.」

LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: 「You... couldn't do anything?」

LABEL: 0x14C0
STRING: Wasn't this just a blackout, like before?

LABEL: 0x1500
STRING: Yukari continued, still hanging her head.

LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: 「...The system in the front section may be nearing its limit.」

LABEL: 0x15E0
STRING: 「I knew this would happen sooner or later, but...」

LABEL: 0x161A
STRING: 「It's more of a miracle that after all that's happened, with all the shocks and vibrations that nearly submerged the entire rear section, it was working normally until now.」

LABEL: 0x16A3
STRING: 「...What exactly is the problem?」

LABEL: 0x174D
STRING: 「To put it bluntly, there appears to be an electrical circuit break somewhere in the power room.」

LABEL: 0x1799
STRING: 「That's probably why this blackout happened.」

LABEL: 0x1890
STRING: 「So, we can't contact the surface and get help...」

LABEL: 0x18D7
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x18F5
STRING: 「Since the power system hasn't been restored, communication with the surface is impossible.」

LABEL: 0x19A5
STRING: 「Oh no...」

LABEL: 0x19C6
STRING: Impossible――

LABEL: 0x19DE
STRING: Yukari's words spilled out of her mouth,

LABEL: 0x1A0A
STRING: all the while trying to hold out hope for the ship and for us, its passengers.

LABEL: 0x1A80
STRING: This wasn't the time to be leisurely thinking about our food supplies.

LABEL: 0x1ACA
STRING: At this point, it would be impossible to continue living inside the <SHEEP III> without outside help.

LABEL: 0x1B1D
STRING: Nevertheless, our means of contacting the outside world were also cut off.

LABEL: 0x1B63
STRING: The reality Yukari divulged to us weighed heavy.

LABEL: 0x1B97
STRING: 「...Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x1BB3
STRING: 「Can't you do something about this?」

LABEL: 0x1C44
STRING: The eccentric genius.

LABEL: 0x1C6A
STRING: Thinking back, she had saved the <SHEEP III> from danger many times before, but she was now keeping silent next to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1CCD
STRING: She straightened her back as I called her name.

LABEL: 0x1D09
STRING: She looked up hesitantly like a student who had forgotten her homework.

LABEL: 0x1DB1
STRING: 「...I'm worthless.」

LABEL: 0x1DDA
STRING: 「That's not――」

LABEL: 0x1E62
STRING: 「There's nothing I can do.」

LABEL: 0x1E84
STRING: 「There's no power in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x1EBC
STRING: 「If it was a software problem, I think I could decipher the internal logic from scratch and do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x1F28
STRING: 「But, I can't even do that...」

LABEL: 0x1F75
STRING: We couldn't interact with the system at all...

LABEL: 0x1FAD
STRING: That meant that I, a system specialist, couldn't do anything about it either.

LABEL: 0x1FF3
STRING: I think we might really be out of options...

LABEL: 0x208D
STRING: 「Ah, if we take a look at it physically, I might be able to do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x20CF
STRING: 「However, I'm not very good at hardware.」

LABEL: 0x2142
STRING: 「Speaking of calling, what about POL?」

LABEL: 0x2164
STRING: The pseudo-intelligence equipped on the ship.

LABEL: 0x2188
STRING: Touri asked with a glimmer of hope, but...

LABEL: 0x2243
STRING: Yukari shook her head, already fed up with the name POL.

LABEL: 0x227E
STRING: The Singularity was still far away.

LABEL: 0x22AC
STRING: 「But it's true that ROMLES have heard from us.」

LABEL: 0x22F0
STRING: 「Then, even in the worst-case scenario that the systems aren't restored, if we just keep waiting here――」

LABEL: 0x23BF
STRING: 「That... may not be the case.」

LABEL: 0x2400
STRING: We would continue living inside this ship using every method available while waiting for help from ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x2449
STRING: That was the same as Yukari's proposal.

LABEL: 0x247B
STRING: Despite that, she herself denied that possibility and spoke hesitantly.

LABEL: 0x252F
STRING: 「...There are a few essential issues.」

LABEL: 0x2635
STRING: 「Are you talking about... that creature?」

LABEL: 0x267E
STRING: 「...That's a part of it, of course.」

LABEL: 0x26B7
STRING: I understood everything from those words alone.

LABEL: 0x26E3
STRING: A vivid scene appeared in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x2713
STRING: That strangely-colored light I had never seen before.

LABEL: 0x27B1
STRING: 「We ran into it again in the hallway on the third floor.」

LABEL: 0x27EC
STRING: 「Ran into...?」

LABEL: 0x280E
STRING: 「So, are you all right?」

LABEL: 0x2843
STRING: 「Yes, as you can see.」

LABEL: 0x28C2
STRING: 「We rushed into the wheelhouse right away, so we were fine.」

LABEL: 0x2900
STRING: 「There's no guarantee that we'll be as safe in the future.」

LABEL: 0x2959
STRING: I see. Yukari was right.

LABEL: 0x2983
STRING: While there was no way out of the ship, there were also predators wandering around inside...

LABEL: 0x29CB
STRING: We couldn't afford to take it easy.

LABEL: 0x2A71
STRING: 「Besides, it's not just about that creature. We discovered it earlier, but this ship...」

LABEL: 0x2B06
STRING: 「H-Hey, wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x2B6D
STRING: Meanwhile, Touri alone had no idea what we were talking about.

LABEL: 0x2C82
STRING: 「Umm... I'm not following since you're talking so fast, but...」

LABEL: 0x2CC6
STRING: 「What do you mean by "that creature?"」

LABEL: 0x2D03
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x2D9B
STRING: Yukari, who had volunteered to explain as usual, was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x2DE1
STRING: How were we supposed to explain this to her?

LABEL: 0x2E41
STRING: ――That thing, which had attacked Reiri...

LABEL: 0x2E69
STRING: We hadn't told her about that light at all.

LABEL: 0x2EA1
STRING: Yukari seemed to pick up on that as she saw how clueless Touri was acting.

LABEL: 0x2EF3
STRING: She held her tongue instantly, and Touri gave her another suspicious look.

LABEL: 0x2F31
STRING: And, the one who came to her rescue was none other than Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x302E
STRING: 「A luminescent organism.」

LABEL: 0x305B
STRING: 「A luminescent organism... So, something that glows in the dark?」

LABEL: 0x3091
STRING: 「We saw something like that in the wheelhouse earlier.」

LABEL: 0x30C6
STRING: 「That might or might not have been the same thing.」

LABEL: 0x30FE
STRING: 「Either way, I've never seen something like it before.」

LABEL: 0x31AE
STRING: 「So there are creatures even you don't know about, Tokiwa-chan.」

LABEL: 0x31FB
STRING: 「It seems so.」

LABEL: 0x3223
STRING: 「Unfortunately. This luminescent organism in question isn't in my database.」

LABEL: 0x32B0
STRING: A creature Tokiwa didn't know about――

LABEL: 0x32D6
STRING: In other words, a creature that mankind didn't know about.

LABEL: 0x3302
STRING: In fact, there was so little known about deep-sea ecosystems that the remark itself was meaningless.

LABEL: 0x336A
STRING: The problem was that it seemingly attacked people.

LABEL: 0x33A4
STRING: And we didn't know how to fight back.

LABEL: 0x34AB
STRING: 「I haven't seen the thing, so I don't know the details, but...」

LABEL: 0x34FB
STRING: 「How did it get into this ship in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x354E
STRING: 「As for its entry route...」

LABEL: 0x35CB
STRING: 「...I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x364A
STRING: 「It's hard to imagine that it was on this ship from the beginning, but...」

LABEL: 0x368C
STRING: 「There are only a limited number of possible routes, so if we go through each one...」

LABEL: 0x3725
STRING: The two of them fell silent.

LABEL: 0x374B
STRING: Touri looked up, thinking.

LABEL: 0x3879
STRING: 「Do you understand now?」

LABEL: 0x38AA
STRING: 「Somehow...」

LABEL: 0x3925
STRING: 「I don't really get it, but does this mean a deep-sea creature has invaded the ship?」

LABEL: 0x39E3
STRING: 「Yes, exactly.」

LABEL: 0x3A07
STRING: 「That's all you need to know.」

LABEL: 0x3A3E
STRING: It sounded like she was making fun of her lightly, but that probably wasn't Yukari's intention.

LABEL: 0x3A84
STRING: What's more, Touri didn't seem to sense anything from Yukari's statement, either.

LABEL: 0x3B34
STRING: 「But, can a creature that lives under the water pressure of the deep sea live normally here?」

LABEL: 0x3B93
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x3BA9
STRING: I thought back to the deep-sea fish we had caught this afternoon.

LABEL: 0x3BE9
STRING: Just as the water pressure in the deep sea was too high for humans, the pressure on the surface was too low for deep-sea creatures.

LABEL: 0x3C53
STRING: Normally, if we humans didn't come all the way down here, we'd never cross paths.

LABEL: 0x3CC6
STRING: 「The deep-sea fish we caught were all round and bursting, right?」

LABEL: 0x3D13
STRING: 「Some fish are like that.」

LABEL: 0x3DD8
STRING: 「If you pull a fish that lives in the sea to the surface...」

LABEL: 0x3E16
STRING: 「The remaining gas in its body expands, and its soft belly swells.」

LABEL: 0x3E66
STRING: 「If there's gas left in its body, it's naturally more susceptible to water pressure.」

LABEL: 0x3EB6
STRING: 「So, creatures that live in the deep sea can make most of the water in their bodies.」

LABEL: 0x3F02
STRING: 「Like increasing the density of their bodies to prevent air bubbles from forming, for example.」

LABEL: 0x3F58
STRING: 「Also, some crustaceans and shellfish in the deep sea can live under normal atmospheric pressure.」

LABEL: 0x4015
STRING: 「Since they're so hard and dense.」

LABEL: 0x4116
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san's right.」

LABEL: 0x4140
STRING: 「ROMLES laboratories also keep crustaceans such as the shinkaia crosnieri under normal atmospheric pressure.」

LABEL: 0x41A4
STRING: 「Just because they're deep-sea creatures doesn't mean they can't live under normal pressure.」

LABEL: 0x4209
STRING: In other words, just because that light was in normal air pressure didn't mean it'd be destroyed.

LABEL: 0x42B4
STRING: What was with that unnecessary vitality?

LABEL: 0x42F8
STRING: It should follow the example of the ocean sunfish or something...

LABEL: 0x43F3
STRING: 「Does that mean that the light is a crustacean, like a prawn or a crab?」

LABEL: 0x4450
STRING: 「I can't say for sure.」

LABEL: 0x447A
STRING: 「However, that's most likely the case.」

LABEL: 0x44AD
STRING: 「Come to think of it, you did say you saw "lots of legs."」

LABEL: 0x44F3
STRING: 「There's a good chance that's what they are.」

LABEL: 0x4555
STRING: So, the next question was...

LABEL: 0x45ED
STRING: 「As for how it entered the ship...」

LABEL: 0x461A
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x4645
STRING: 「I have a theory.」

LABEL: 0x4688
STRING: 「Really?」

LABEL: 0x46B5
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x4728
STRING: 「I'm sure everyone will agree with it.」

LABEL: 0x4761
STRING: Tokiwa looked around at us, then changed her expression.

LABEL: 0x480B
STRING: 「Remember how yesterday, when we rescued Reiri-chan, we used the elevator in the rear section?」

LABEL: 0x486B
STRING: 「At that time, the elevator was filled with deep-sea water, and it was opened on the first floor.」

LABEL: 0x48C4
STRING: 「The luminescent organism was mixed in with the water and made its way inside that way.」

LABEL: 0x4910
STRING: 「...How does that sound?」

LABEL: 0x4945
STRING: ――Certainly...

LABEL: 0x495F
STRING: That wasn't out of the question.

LABEL: 0x498B
STRING: That was the only time that seawater from the deep sea had flowed into the ship―――

LABEL: 0x49C7
STRING: 「But I didn't see any lights like that at the time.」

LABEL: 0x49FB
STRING: 「Why only now...?」

LABEL: 0x4A2E
STRING: 「There wasn't anything like that on the first floor yesterday, either.」

LABEL: 0x4A7C
STRING: 「Yeah. I've been there a few times, but I didn't see anything resembling that light.」

LABEL: 0x4B28
STRING: 「...What if it was "hiding?"」

LABEL: 0x4B71
STRING: 「Hiding?」

LABEL: 0x4B8B
STRING: 「Even though there weren't people around...?」

LABEL: 0x4BC0
STRING: 「It must have been confused by its new environment.」

LABEL: 0x4C51
STRING: 「Even ordinary fish get confused when they move to a new tank.」

LABEL: 0x4C95
STRING: 「And so, once they get used to it, they continue their normal activities.」

LABEL: 0x4CCE
STRING: Contrary to the way she said this was a theory, Tokiwa seemed quite certain of herself.

LABEL: 0x4D38
STRING: Yukari, who had been listening to the discussion, looked up with a stern look in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x4DE4
STRING: 「Either way――」

LABEL: 0x4E06
STRING: 「There's only one thing that's important.」

LABEL: 0x4E89
STRING: 「The light... That creature is dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x4EB3
STRING: 「So if anyone sees it, be sure to run away.」

LABEL: 0x4EF7
STRING: 「We don't know how it'll act, so we mustn't provoke it.」

LABEL: 0x4F58
STRING: Then, she fell silent.

LABEL: 0x4F7C
STRING: No one spoke.

LABEL: 0x4F9C
STRING: Yukari, Hiragino, Tokiwa, and Touri.

LABEL: 0x4FC2
STRING: Everyone was looking at each other with grave expressions.

LABEL: 0x4FF4
STRING: No one said a thing.

LABEL: 0x5018
STRING: It was an eerie silence.

LABEL: 0x5034
STRING: Even as we stood here, unable to do anything, time was passing.

LABEL: 0x50E0
STRING: 「H-Hey...」

LABEL: 0x50FA
STRING: 「Everyone's faces are kind of scary.」

LABEL: 0x5183
STRING: 「It's at times like these that we have to brighten up!」

LABEL: 0x51CA
STRING: 「...Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0x51ED
STRING: Yukari... and Tokiwa as well must have realized it as they looked at her face.

LABEL: 0x5237
STRING: That Touri still didn't know about Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5334
STRING: 「We were telling ghost stories just before you got here!」

LABEL: 0x53F4
STRING: Huh?」

LABEL: 0x5494
STRING: 「Don't you know any?」

LABEL: 0x54C2
STRING: 「These two told me some pretty scary ones...」

LABEL: 0x55AE
STRING: 「I know!」

LABEL: 0x55CD
STRING: She clapped her hands in front of her chest.

LABEL: 0x565D
STRING: 「Now it's your turn to tell a scary story!」

LABEL: 0x56EB
STRING: 「I may not look it, but I love horror stories!」

LABEL: 0x5726
STRING: Touri smiled.

LABEL: 0x57B8
STRING: 「So please, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x586F
STRING: Her smile.

LABEL: 0x5889
STRING: Yukari's face twitched seeing it.

LABEL: 0x58AB
STRING: Of course, there was no way she would agree in a situation like this...

LABEL: 0x596D
STRING: 「Have you heard of the "Flying Dutchman?"」

LABEL: 0x59B6
STRING: 「Dutchman? Is it a scary story?」

LABEL: 0x5A52
STRING: 「Yes, he was the captain of a wandering ghost ship...」

LABEL: 0x5A8A
STRING: 「It was a ghost ship that was doomed to wander the seas forever.」

LABEL: 0x5ABF
STRING: ...Looks like she's getting into this.

LABEL: 0x5B1D
STRING: And so, Yukari, followed by Tokiwa, told a ghost story of their own.

LABEL: 0x5B5B
STRING: Contrary to my expectations, our story time continued smoothly.

LABEL: 0x5B9F
STRING: For some reason, Touri's turn was skipped, and it was my turn again now.

LABEL: 0x5BDD
STRING: And just as the second round was about to end...

LABEL: 0x5C2F
STRING: Guu―

LABEL: 0x5C43
STRING: A sound came out of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x5C6D
STRING: My doubts about what it was were quickly dispelled.

LABEL: 0x5C9F
STRING: Touri looked around the room.

LABEL: 0x5CB7
STRING: She turned bright red and clutched her stomach.

LABEL: 0x5DA8
STRING: 「...I told you!」

LABEL: 0x5DCD
STRING: 「This is why I told you I wanted to eat something!

LABEL: 0x5E61
STRING: Geez!」

LABEL: 0x5E77
STRING: Come to think of it, Touri had been making a fuss about being hungry for a while.

LABEL: 0x5EBB
STRING: For her to suggest something like telling ghost stories, which was a time-consuming activity...

LABEL: 0x5F09
STRING: This girl was really out of it.

LABEL: 0x5F4A
STRING: 「Come on everyone, let's eat something.」

LABEL: 0x603E
STRING: 「Tokiwa-chan, you're hungry too, right?」

LABEL: 0x6081
STRING: 「It's a temptation I can't resist.」

LABEL: 0x610B
STRING: 「See!」

LABEL: 0x6128
STRING: What she wanted me to see, I didn't know, but eating something might be a good idea.

LABEL: 0x618C
STRING: Looking at the LCD clock on the wall, it had already been nearly an hour since Touri had woken up.

LABEL: 0x61DA
STRING: If I had to say, the thought that this wasn't the time to be eating was still winning over my appetite, but...

LABEL: 0x6276
STRING: We had to eat at some point.

LABEL: 0x62B0
STRING: It was important to eat when you could during an emergency like this, and if possible, I wanted to recover the remaining food.

LABEL: 0x6320
STRING: 「Yukari, the food was on the first floor, right?」

LABEL: 0x63BB
STRING: 「Yes, inside the warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x63E4
STRING: Memories came flooding back.

LABEL: 0x63FC
STRING: It was only yesterday that I had went to get food from there with Yukari and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x6453
STRING: 「If we go grab the food like we did yesterday...」

LABEL: 0x64F1
STRING: 「...To be honest, it's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x6515
STRING: 「Let me repeat myself. Our situation is different from yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x6555
STRING: 「Not only are the lighting and systems unstable, but we also don't know if we'll run into that light...」

LABEL: 0x65A6
STRING: 「But at this rate, the situation will only get worse.」

LABEL: 0x65E2
STRING: A situation where I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x6602
STRING: And if I did do something, it would only get worse.

LABEL: 0x6632
STRING: There wasn't much that could be done in the first place.

LABEL: 0x666E
STRING: If I went about my business while remaining vigilant, then...

LABEL: 0x66AA
STRING: As long as I managed to secure the food, I could escape the threat of that light if I stayed inside the rooms.

LABEL: 0x6718
STRING: If I was going to go, now was my only chance――

LABEL: 0x6740
STRING: 「There's no need for everyone to go.」

LABEL: 0x676A
STRING: 「Just one person is enough.」

LABEL: 0x6812
STRING: 「You look like you want to discuss who that would be.」

LABEL: 0x6851
STRING: Gulp.

LABEL: 0x6867
STRING: Yukari exhaled in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x68FB
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei's not feeling well, Touri-chan has just woken up, and I have my responsibility as the chief attendant...」

LABEL: 0x695F
STRING: 「There are all kinds of excuses for you to go and get the food yourself...」

LABEL: 0x69A4
STRING: 「How did you...?」

LABEL: 0x69D5
STRING: 「Your scenario is too obvious.」

LABEL: 0x6A0C
STRING: She looked up with tired eyes.

LABEL: 0x6A32
STRING: It was like she could see right through me...

LABEL: 0x6A58
STRING: She hit the nail on the head, so I couldn't say anything back...

LABEL: 0x6A86
STRING: 「...Yeah, you're right.」

LABEL: 0x6AAE
STRING: 「Since we can't access electronic devices, all I can do right now is put my body on the line.」

LABEL: 0x6B0E
STRING: 「And in terms of stamina alone, I have more than anyone else... So isn't this the best course of action?」

LABEL: 0x6BC8
STRING: 「Yes, it's as you say.」

LABEL: 0x6BF7
STRING: When I raised my voice, Yukari gave in more easily than I expected.

LABEL: 0x6C43
STRING: I felt kind of disappointed...

LABEL: 0x6C7E
STRING: 「I'm not foolish enough to mince my words in a pressing situation like this.」

LABEL: 0x6CD8
STRING: 「You're right, it would be best for you to go.」

LABEL: 0x6D25
STRING: 「Momoi, are you serious?」

LABEL: 0x6D4A
STRING: There was a counterargument from an unexpected source.

LABEL: 0x6D70
STRING: Hiragino looked at Yukari sternly.

LABEL: 0x6E6D
STRING: 「Are you going to send an unarmed passenger to a place you know is dangerous?」

LABEL: 0x6EBD
STRING: 「It would be a different story if they had some kind of a countermeasure, but...」

LABEL: 0x6F67
STRING: 「There is one.」

LABEL: 0x6F89
STRING: 「――Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x6FF0
STRING: 「Heigh-ho.」

LABEL: 0x700F
STRING: She gave a comical reply with a serious look on her face.

LABEL: 0x7108
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, if you're going to get the food...」

LABEL: 0x713A
STRING: 「Please take Tokiwa-san with you.」

LABEL: 0x717F
STRING: 「Please take me with you.」

LABEL: 0x71B2
STRING: 「I don't mind, but...」

LABEL: 0x71DC
STRING: I was grateful to have someone's help for a dangerous job like this.

LABEL: 0x722A
STRING: However, Yukari's statement wasn't in that context.

LABEL: 0x7264
STRING: It wasn't just to have a helping hand. There was some other meaning in having Tokiwa come with me.

LABEL: 0x72C8
STRING: Why Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x72EA
STRING: Why did it have to be her?

LABEL: 0x732F
STRING: 「Why her?」

LABEL: 0x7364
STRING: 「...Just in case.」

LABEL: 0x73E1
STRING: 「You're fine with that, right Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x7471
STRING: 「Yes, that's a given.」

LABEL: 0x749D
STRING: Tokiwa puffed her chest out in pride.

LABEL: 0x74BB
STRING: I didn't think they were on the same wavelength here, but whatever.

LABEL: 0x7501
STRING: Or maybe they were, and it just didn't look like it?

LABEL: 0x7583
STRING: In the end, I was left with the reality that I was going to get the food with Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x75C9
STRING: I left the crew room with her without pursuing whatever intentions there were hidden in the background.

LABEL: 0x76FF
STRING: Clomp, clomp.

LABEL: 0x771D
STRING: We descend the stairs in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x7747
STRING: The space was filled with only the sound of our own footsteps.

LABEL: 0x7775
STRING: A flashlight illuminated our surroundings.

LABEL: 0x7799
STRING: I timidly walked through the closed space...

LABEL: 0x77C9
STRING: I felt like I was participating in a test of courage.

LABEL: 0x77F3
STRING: After hearing those ghost stories earlier, the atmosphere felt even more intense.

LABEL: 0x7833
STRING: I was terrified of the echoes coming from the other side of the endless passageway.

LABEL: 0x787F
STRING: At this point, it felt scary that there were no people here where they should be.

LABEL: 0x78E1
STRING: It was easy to forget when you were in Tokyo, but it reminded me of how terrifying the streets were at night in the suburbs.

LABEL: 0x79C2
STRING: I heard the sound of water in the distance.

LABEL: 0x79EC
STRING: I stopped in my tracks.

LABEL: 0x7A0C
STRING: The sound of dripping water must have reached this far because it echoed off the walls and ceiling.

LABEL: 0x7A54
STRING: I was starting to doubt if I'd be able to act properly when the time came if this was all it took to unnerve me...

LABEL: 0x7ABC
STRING: I had no guts at all.

LABEL: 0x7B47
STRING: Beside me, Tokiwa was as calm as ever.

LABEL: 0x7B77
STRING: I looked to my side and saw the girl walking slowly, her hands clasped together in front of her waist.

LABEL: 0x7BBF
STRING: She didn't seem fazed at all. She maintained a steady rhythm as she walked forward.

LABEL: 0x7C07
STRING: ...I had to do something to calm myself down.

LABEL: 0x7C92
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x7D1C
STRING: 「Heigh-ho?」

LABEL: 0x7D3D
STRING: 「Um... Do you like scary stories like Touri?」

LABEL: 0x7D90
STRING: 「Scary stories... Are you talking about ghost stories?」

LABEL: 0x7DCD
STRING: Answering a question with a question...

LABEL: 0x7E57
STRING: 「I like ghost stories, but it seems that ghost stories don't like me.」

LABEL: 0x7EAC
STRING: 「The ghost stories don't like you?」

LABEL: 0x7F1B
STRING: When I asked her again, she nodded with a straight face.

LABEL: 0x7F4C
STRING: What in the world is this girl saying?

LABEL: 0x7F89
STRING: 「I've met someone who told ghost stories several times in the past.」

LABEL: 0x7FD1
STRING: 「But for some reason, I wasn't allowed to hear many of them.」

LABEL: 0x801C
STRING: 「Was it bullying, or...?」

LABEL: 0x80B8
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x80DB
STRING: 「I see... That must have been tough...」

LABEL: 0x810F
STRING: Frankly, I didn't really understand how bullying someone by not letting them hear ghost stories worked.

LABEL: 0x815F
STRING: ...Actually, I found myself not particularly interested in her past all of a sudden...

LABEL: 0x81BC
STRING: 「It was tough...」

LABEL: 0x8233
STRING: 「Yes. It was very tough.」

LABEL: 0x82EE
STRING: 「Since they went out of their way to tell me a ghost story, I tried explaining it all by natural phenomena.」

LABEL: 0x8351
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x837A
STRING: 「That said, they were all exceedingly simple to explain.」

LABEL: 0x83E6
STRING: 「But by the time I had finished, they...」

LABEL: 0x8476
STRING: 「They vowed to never tell me a ghost story again.」

LABEL: 0x8517
STRING: 「Don't you think that's terrible?」

LABEL: 0x8548
STRING: 「No, not at all.」

LABEL: 0x8564
STRING: Was she a demon?

LABEL: 0x8580
STRING: Think about how a magician would feel if all their tricks were exposed right in front of them as they performed their magic.

LABEL: 0x85DE
STRING: What was even sadder was that they had to hold back their best stories, knowing they would all be picked apart.

LABEL: 0x8644
STRING: That was what you'd call an overwhelming difference in strength.

LABEL: 0x86E0
STRING: 「For example, one story they told me was about a fireball at sea...」

LABEL: 0x872F
STRING: 「Wait! That's enough! I get it!」

LABEL: 0x87CB
STRING: 「Even you, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x87F2
STRING: Tokiwa looked sad.

LABEL: 0x881A
STRING: I was the one who wanted to cry here.

LABEL: 0x883E
STRING: Don't take our fantasies away from us...

LABEL: 0x894A
STRING: We made it to the warehouse without any more small talk.

LABEL: 0x8986
STRING: I immediately held the keycard up to the door.

LABEL: 0x89B2
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x89CA
STRING: There was no response.

LABEL: 0x89E6
STRING: Normally, a light electronic sound would ring out.

LABEL: 0x8A1C
STRING: Don't tell me it isn't working because of the blackout?

LABEL: 0x8A56
STRING: 「Tokiwa, the door――」

LABEL: 0x8A87
STRING: 「It's open.」

LABEL: 0x8AA8
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x8AC2
STRING: I looked over and saw that she had pulled the door open with her hand.

LABEL: 0x8AF2
STRING: I see, so it was a disaster prevention system where the doors were unlocked during a blackout...

LABEL: 0x8B38
STRING: I put the keycard away and followed Tokiwa into the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x8C20
STRING: 「I can't see a thing...」

LABEL: 0x8C55
STRING: 「Shirak!」

LABEL: 0x8C75
STRING: She turned her flashlight on.

LABEL: 0x8C99
STRING: It illuminated the room one part at a time.

LABEL: 0x8CC1
STRING: There were scattered cardboard boxes and various pieces of equipment that seemed to have fallen over.

LABEL: 0x8D0D
STRING: There was something like a part of a diving suit lying on the floor.

LABEL: 0x8D45
STRING: 「Was it this messy the last time we were here?」

LABEL: 0x8D8C
STRING: 「There's hardly any difference.」

LABEL: 0x8DBB
STRING: When we encountered that man, he had come up the stairs from the first floor.

LABEL: 0x8DFE
STRING: Which meant this warehouse might have already been searched at that point.

LABEL: 0x8E4C
STRING: 「It's messy... but everything looks otherwise fine in here.」

LABEL: 0x8E8A
STRING: 「Guess I'll just take whatever is nearby.」

LABEL: 0x8EC2
STRING: 「What about you, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x8F52
STRING: 「I'll take something heavier than a football fish――」

LABEL: 0x8F99
STRING: 「Take that one over there. It's small.」

LABEL: 0x905A
STRING: Tokiwa stood there with her cheeks puffed out in silence.

LABEL: 0x90A2
STRING: However, as soon as I started moving my hands, she began gathering things.

LABEL: 0x90EE
STRING: How should I put this? She was pretty easy to handle once you got the hang of it.

LABEL: 0x9189
STRING: I picked out some supplies for the immediate future.

LABEL: 0x91C1
STRING: The elevator was no longer usable.

LABEL: 0x91EF
STRING: I packed as many supplies as I could into random cardboard boxes.

LABEL: 0x9237
STRING: Two meals worth of food, for now.

LABEL: 0x925D
STRING: If that's all there is...

LABEL: 0x927D
STRING: Maybe there was no need for anything more than that.

LABEL: 0x930C
STRING: 「...Okay, that should do it.」

LABEL: 0x93A0
STRING: 「Ah, are you done?」

LABEL: 0x93CB
STRING: Wiping off my sweat, I strode over to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x946D
STRING: 「Then I'll take this box.」

LABEL: 0x958F
STRING: She desperately tried to lift it, but it didn't move an inch. She stood in front of the box, troubled.

LABEL: 0x9651
STRING: 「Aah... Why can't I even lift a single cardboard box...?」

LABEL: 0x96AA
STRING: At this point, there was no reason to doubt her smartness, but...

LABEL: 0x979B
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x981D
STRING: 「This is glued to the floor, isn't it!?」

LABEL: 0x985C
STRING: ...Did she have a reason for doubting me?

LABEL: 0x9908
STRING: Holding most of the cardboard boxes, I stepped out into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x993C
STRING: I let her carry one of the lightest of the bunch.

LABEL: 0x997B
STRING: It was useless to expect Tokiwa to do any heavy lifting in the future.

LABEL: 0x99BD
STRING: 「Okay, let's get to the stairs――」

LABEL: 0x9A53
STRING: 「...Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9A71
STRING: 「It's getting a little dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x9A9A
STRING: What was that?

LABEL: 0x9AB4
STRING: She sounded like she was joking.

LABEL: 0x9AD4
STRING: I was already tired from carrying these heavy boxes. What was she talking about now?

LABEL: 0x9B2A
STRING: 「What is it, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x9BBA
STRING: 「It's here.」

LABEL: 0x9BD9
STRING: What was here?

LABEL: 0x9BF1
STRING: Did she think I had developed psychic powers or something?

LABEL: 0x9C67
STRING: 「Over there.」

LABEL: 0x9CBC
STRING: I followed her gaze.

LABEL: 0x9CDE
STRING: At the end of the passage, there was darkness.

LABEL: 0x9CFC
STRING: I couldn't... see anything there――

LABEL: 0x9D28
STRING: ...Was this more of her nonsense?

LABEL: 0x9D50
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x9D68
STRING: It bothered me.

LABEL: 0x9D80
STRING: Yukari had made Tokiwa go with me for a reason.

LABEL: 0x9DA6
STRING: Was it really okay to ignore her?

LABEL: 0x9DD4
STRING: What was she looking at?

LABEL: 0x9DF6
STRING: What did she see――

LABEL: 0x9E2D
STRING: 「Are we not running away?」

LABEL: 0x9E56
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x9E72
STRING: I strained my eyes.

LABEL: 0x9E8C
STRING: Was there something there?

LABEL: 0x9F03
STRING: I kept looking...

LABEL: 0x9F7A
STRING: I focused my gaze...

LABEL: 0x9FF1
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xA0C3
STRING: ――Light.

LABEL: 0xA0D9
STRING: Hazy light rose up from the darkness.

LABEL: 0xA101
STRING: It was a weak green color.

LABEL: 0xA11D
STRING: It was faint, deep, and mysterious...

LABEL: 0xA141
STRING: Beautiful light.

LABEL: 0xA159
STRING: Alluring light.

LABEL: 0xA173
STRING: A light in colors I had never seen before, attracting people to it.

LABEL: 0xA1B3
STRING: It happened in an instant.

LABEL: 0xA1D5
STRING: The light that rose up in the blink of an eye stopped there, unmoving.

LABEL: 0xA2C1
STRING: Extending joints.

LABEL: 0xA2D9
STRING: Extending light.

LABEL: 0xA2F1
STRING: Streaks of light spilled out one after another.

LABEL: 0xA321
STRING: They branched out, filling the area.

LABEL: 0xA353
STRING: Before long, it had spread out like a network――

LABEL: 0xA403
STRING: 「――Let's run!」

LABEL: 0xA4A0
STRING: I started running with Tokiwa in tow.

LABEL: 0xA4C8
STRING: Tokiwa, who was running while dutifully holding the cardboard box in her arms was... slow.

LABEL: 0xA502
STRING: We wouldn't be able to get far like this...

LABEL: 0xA530
STRING: I immediately rushed into a nearby room.

LABEL: 0xA564
STRING: 「Tokiwa, hurry!」

LABEL: 0xA593
STRING: 「Just... 4.32 seconds to go.」

LABEL: 0xA5BD
STRING: She ran while telling me that.

LABEL: 0xA5E1
STRING: Behind her was a single streak of light.

LABEL: 0xA601
STRING: She had time.

LABEL: 0xA61B
STRING: She would make it.

LABEL: 0xA633
STRING: But... she was slow.

LABEL: 0xA651
STRING: I was getting impatient.

LABEL: 0xA66F
STRING: 「Hurry up!」

LABEL: 0xA696
STRING: 「I don't wanna.」

LABEL: 0xA6B5
STRING: Tokiwa entered the room at a jogging pace.

LABEL: 0xA6FD
STRING: I closed the door, aiming for that moment.

LABEL: 0xA7A8
STRING: All right...!

LABEL: 0xA7C0
STRING: I slumped to the ground.

LABEL: 0xA7E8
STRING: 「Haah... haah...」

LABEL: 0xA80A
STRING: 「...Are you all right, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0xA89C
STRING: 「That was a new personal best.」

LABEL: 0xA8BC
STRING: 「My whole body will be sore tomorrow.」

LABEL: 0xA8E9
STRING: She said that, but her breathing didn't seem ragged at all.

LABEL: 0xA91D
STRING: Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0xA93B
STRING: To be honest, running at a jog like that wouldn't be enough to make anyone run out of breath.

LABEL: 0xA991
STRING: I was more worried that Tokiwa would get attacked by that light.

LABEL: 0xA9ED
STRING: She was wandering around the room as I looked up.

LABEL: 0xAAC7
STRING: 「Which room is this?」

LABEL: 0xAB22
STRING: 「It feels extremely friendly here for some reason.」

LABEL: 0xAB6E
STRING: 「Friendly...?」

LABEL: 0xAB8C
STRING: It was true that this place felt familiar to me in the darkness. I was pretty this was...

LABEL: 0xABDE
STRING: 「Right... The research room.」
